post.description: Changes the role of a user account
Adds a new variant to an existing product
Adds a new review to a product
Creates multiple products in a single request
Adds a new subcategory to an existing category
Schedules a maintenance task for a specific pond
Schedules a cleaning task for a specific pond
Adds a new maintenance record for a specific pond
Sets an alert for a specific pond (e.g., water quality issues)
Adjusts the feeding schedule for a specific pond
From admin updates the order status to SHIPPING : {PENDING,CANCELLED, SUCCESS, SHIPPING, DELIVERED, }
From other user updates their order status to DELIVERED  : {PENDING,CANCELLED, SUCCESS, SHIPPING, DELIVERED, }
Adds a new medical record for a specific koi fish
Adds a new breeding record for a specific koi fish
Updates multiple koi fish records in a single request
Moves a cart item to the 'Save for Later' list
Moves a saved item back to the active cart

get.description: Retrieves various statistics about user accounts
Searches for users based on various criteria
Retrieves the maintenance history for a specific pond
Retrieves the current fish count in a specific pond
Retrieves environmental data (temperature, pH, etc.) for a specific pond
Retrieves all active alerts for a specific pond
Searches for koi fish based on various criteria
Retrieves the medical history for a specific koi fish
Retrieves the breeding history for a specific koi fish
Retrieves a summary of the user's cart including total price, discounts, and taxes
Retrieves data for user growth chart
Retrieves data for order status breakdown chart
